translations: pron.（作为动词或介词的宾语）谁，无论谁（whosoever的宾格，等于whoever）

sentences.sentence: Now at that feast he released unto them one prisoner, whomsoever they desired.
sentences.translation: 每逢这节期，巡抚照众人所求的，释放一个囚犯给他们。

sentences.sentence: And when I come, whomsoever ye shall approve by your letters, them will I send to bring your liberality unto Jerusalem.
sentences.translation: 及至我来到了，你们写信举荐谁，我就打发他们，把你们的捐资送到耶路撒冷去。

sentences.sentence: Whosoever shall fall upon that stone shall be broken; but on whomsoever it shall fall, it will grind him to powder.
sentences.translation: 凡掉在那石头上的，必要跌碎。 那石头掉在谁的身上，就要把谁砸得稀烂。
